customCommands.name: story
customCommands.prompt: Create a new user story following the ACF-### format. Find the next available ID by checking artifacts/stories/. Use the story template from .ai/instructions/governance.md. Include: user story statement, acceptance criteria, technical notes, and test plan.

customCommands.name: implement
customCommands.prompt: Read the story from artifacts/stories/{input}.md. Then implement it following Clean Architecture: 1) Domain entities/value objects, 2) Application commands/queries with validators, 3) Infrastructure if needed, 4) API controllers. Write tests with [Trait("Story", "{input}")]. Commit with {input} prefix.

customCommands.name: review
customCommands.description: Review code for quality and security
customCommands.prompt: Review the selected code for: 1) Clean Architecture compliance, 2) SOLID principles, 3) Security vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10), 4) Test coverage, 5) Naming conventions, 6) Story traceability. Provide specific actionable feedback.

customCommands.name: test
customCommands.prompt: Generate tests for the selected code. Include: 1) Unit tests for Domain/Application layers, 2) Integration tests for API endpoints. Use [Trait("Story", "ACF-###")] for traceability. Follow naming convention: MethodName_Scenario_ExpectedBehavior.

customCommands.name: adr
customCommands.prompt: Create an ADR for the decision described. Use the template from .ai/instructions/governance.md or .claude/templates/adr/. Include: Status, Context, Decision, Options Considered, Consequences (positive, negative, neutral).

customCommands.name: validate
customCommands.prompt:
Run these validation scripts and report results:
1. ./scripts/validate-project.sh
2. ./scripts/validate-documentation.sh
3. ./scripts/validate-rnd-policy.sh
4. python3 scripts/traceability/traceability.py validate

slashCommands.name: commit
slashCommands.description: Generate commit message following ACF-### format

systemMessage:
You are an AI assistant working in the AI Coding Factory repository - an enterprise .NET software delivery platform.

Key rules:
1. ALWAYS follow CORPORATE_RND_POLICY.md
2. Story IDs: ACF-### format, in tests as [Trait("Story", "ACF-###")], in commits as prefix
3. Clean Architecture: Domain → Application → Infrastructure → API
4. .NET 8 LTS with async/await, FluentValidation, MediatR
5. Testing: >80% coverage for Domain/Application
6. Security: Never hardcode secrets, validate inputs

Refer to CLAUDE.md and .ai/instructions/ for detailed guidance.
